channel.title: KbotPro (kosaki bot)
channel.description:
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/s25yyb.png[/img] KBotPRO is a bot / automation tool for the MMORPG called Runescape. It can basically automate everything in Runescape dynamically as well as solving the random events for you. This includes training skills, such as mining, woodcutting, fishing and others, while also the ability to use money making scripts along with merchanting scripts.
KBotPRO is written in the programming language Java and is currently the most advanced bot for Runescape.
The bot offers multi client botting. In other words you can bot on many accounts at once. Only limited by the processing powers of your computer.
Different features we have compared to other bots: - Multi client - User friendly and nice looking user interface - Smart solutions. IE: search features. - Memory optimization features. - Multi-threading scripts are an easy task and a convenience, making it easy on the script. - EXACT model clicking separates us from our competitors, which allows for more accurate and stable scripts. - Downloads scripts from our server instead of wasting your computer space with unused scripts. - Arguably the most human-like mouse movements seen in any bot, based on gravitational formulas rather than splines, and updated in real time. - Great friendly and professional acting staff, with a great community to participate in.
The bot is scriptable and scripting to it by Java is easy to learn. The bot is ONE file, which means updating and running is simple. No need for SVN, which can be a tedious and confusing setup, for getting the most recent updates.
Our community is based on your forum username and password, which allows you to login to the bot. The bot is not open source, which keeps all of our secrets with us and will not be reproduced. This means there may be attempts to copy what we have, but will never be the same.
Images: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nk8iut.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2jaaz3r.jpg[/img] [img]http://boonce.org/up/epicEM.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/23h54zs.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qk1pur.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/rutzyf.png[/img]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2samp1s.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/15e7qpz.png[/img] Setup tutorial/how to download bot: [url=http://kbot.info/vb/showthread.php?p=99361#post99361"]kbot tut[/url]

[/quote]

Your an idiot. I have been using kbot for months now.[/quote]That was before I knew we have to login with our forum account. Till now I love this bot.

item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Aeolian.:

i hope you know rsbot still works and this bot isint needed all you do is start up any rsbot and it will say update then click that and it will automaticly update for u and give u the latest bot out there im useing it exactly right now & if u trust this bot then stay on it no big deal it my take ur personal information thats ur prob im just saying that rsbot still works and i think everyone should use it.

RSBot still blows ass though.

Read full topic

o well any way its not cool bots are stupid.
if you use bots have fun getting banned.
[/quote]If you can’t tell, hardly any of us care about RS anymore. I’ve botted, shared, abused a glitch (was minor, but still did), and probably broke plenty of other rules, and I’m still not banned. I’ve been muted twice due to account sharing stuff, but thats it.

Just wait until JaGeX finds out you use private servers

@Topic: I might have to try this out considering RSBot is down gone.[/quote]

item.title: KbotPro (kosaki bot)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“BlacknRaven, post:25, topic:332339”]Ok this is basicly like rsbot and who who use a dumb bot if only they want to get banned from runescape for ever did u read the news dumbass:

This is the news from RuneScape Enjoy:

[quote]
The recent cheating that occurred and the abuse of an exploit has been dealt with very seriously. We have excellent systems in place to catch and detect players who abuse bugs and have taken appropriate measures.

We have now banned 68 accounts PERMANENTLY, with another 48 receiving temporary bans. There are a further 117 accounts which have been temporarily banned while undergoing further investigation. These will be dealt with very shortly.

To give you some idea of the players involved, here are the ten highest-level players banned so far (based on total skill level):

•2,376 total level (520 days of in-game time)
•2,308 total level (477 days of in-game time)
•2,210 total level (365 days of in-game time)
•2,179 total level (1,004 days of in-game time)
•2,131 total level (394 days of in-game time)
•2,105 total level (202 days of in-game time)
•2,102 total level (274 days of in-game time)
•2,096 total level (448 days of in-game time)
•2,022 total level (337 days of in-game time)
•2,021 total level (275 days of in-game time)
We’d like to remind everyone that using macros and abusing bugs is NOT tolerated under any circumstances, and we will ban ANY accounts that have been cheating.

Mod DC
Investigations into the Community Team

[/quote][/quote]
That message was about people abusing a glitch. Not botting.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:15, topic:332339”][quote author=KTom link=topic=428776.msg3147787#msg3147787 date=1268254485]
moparscape is about cheating in rs kind of
and bots are generally classed cheating
but if you know a better place please feel free to move it
[/quote]Sadly, it’s classified as advertising. Considering you need to visit the forum in order to create an account to access the bot, you’re directing traffic there via moparscape… Perhaps it is a nice bot, this is a place for discussion, not introduction. You can discuss the bot, but not offer anything of it.[/quote]
We allowed it with RSBot over at Mitb. I see no reason to disallow it for a different bot.

Read full topic
